name: Danger Doofus
description:
World famous archeologist, Dr. Darren Doofus, boldly enters an ancient tomb filled with pitfalls, puzzles, and perils. Will he be able to brave them all? Sure he will - he is a hero! He and only he can do it!

Controls:

  • Move left/right: Arrow keys / A / D / D-Pad / Left Stick
  • Jump: Up / W / Gamepad South Button
  • Pause Menu: Escape / Start
  • Select in Menu: Enter / Spacebar / Gamepad South Button

If Doofus falls off the screen or is otherwise unable to complete the level, restart it from the pause menu.
